name: Football Manager Touch 2017 Demo
detailed_description:
Take control of your favourite football team in Football Manager Touch 2017, the streamlined, ‘transfers and tactics’ way to enjoy football management.

With over 2,500 real clubs to manage and over 190,000 real footballers and staff to sign, Football Manager Touch 2017 packs the depth of Football Manager’s acclaimed data but provides a faster experience, focusing on the core managerial duties.

You’ll have full control of transfers and decide who plays, and who sits on the bench. You're in complete control of tactics and you’ll follow the match live with our acclaimed 3D match engine. For managers in a hurry, Touch lets you simulate your match at the click of a button, allowing you to speed through your season to glory.

Fans who pre-purchase Football Manager Touch 2017 will also enjoy access to a fully-playable Beta version of the game, which will be available roughly two weeks prior to the official release date. Careers started in this Beta version will continue in the full game.

short_description: Take control of your favourite football team in Football Manager Touch 2017, the streamlined, ‘transfers and tactics’ way to enjoy football management.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Greek, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Swedish, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista (SP2), 7 (SP1), 8, 8.1, 10 (1607) – 64-bit or 32-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4, Intel Core or AMD Athlon – 2.2 GHz +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X3100, NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 2400 – 256MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.7.5, 10.8.5, 10.9.5, 10.10.5, 10.11.6, 10.12 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 – 1.8GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X3100, NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 2400 – 256MB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS, Ubuntu 12.04.5 LTS Linux (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4, Intel Core or AMD Athlon – 2.2 GHz +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000/4000, NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 2400 – 256MB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
